about_the_game:
Welcome to Lintukoto Reserve, a Scandinavian gem where the wild and serene blend seamlessly. This vast reserve offers an array of biomes and breathtaking landscapes that will captivate nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts alike.

Discover Lintukoto Reserve

The Lintukoto Reserve is a natural paradise that showcases the rich biodiversity and stunning beauty of Scandinavian habitats. Across the vast landscape, you can wander through wide, magical forests that shimmer under gentle rain, wide meadows thriving with life, tranquil wetlands with meandering water channels, and hills occasionally dusted with snow. Every corner of the reserve offers a new adventure and a chance to observe nature in its purest form.

Meet Mikael Anderson

Step into the shoes of Mikael Anderson, a 45-year-old nature enthusiast who is taking up his new role as manager of the Lintukoto Reserve. He is a rugged man, with wrinkles and stubble but undeniable charm. With Mikael’s journey, you can unlock various story endings. As Mikael, you'll explore the reserve, uncover its hidden gems, and forge connections with its wildlife. Immerse yourself in the splendor of Lintukoto Reserve and discover nature in a way that is both breathtaking and soothing to the soul.

Enchanting Scandinavian Fauna & Flora

Lintukoto Reserve offers a unique blend of environments and is home to an array of wildlife, including stealthy Northern Lynx, Mountain Reindeer, Arctic Fox, and the majestic Eurasian Moose - Mikael’s favorite animal. Whether observing from a high vantage point or quietly watching by the river deltas, every moment in Lintukoto Reserve brings a new sight and a deeper connection to nature.

Wildlife of Lintukoto Reserve

  • Arctic Fox (Vulpes lagopus)
  • Brown Bear (Ursus arctos)
  • Eurasian Badger (Meles meles)
  • Eurasian Moose (Alces alces alces)
  • Eurasian Wolverine (Gulo gulo gulo)
  • European Hare (Lepus europaeus)
  • European Rabbit (Oryctolagus cuniculus)
  • Fallow Deer (Dama dama)
  • Gray Wolf (Canis lupus)
  • Greylag Goose (Anser anser)
  • Mouflon (Ovis musimon)
  • Mountain Reindeer (Rangifer tarandus tarandus)
  • Northern Lynx (Lynx lynx lynx)
  • Pheasant (Phasianus colchicus)
  • Red Deer (Cervus elaphus)
  • Red Fox (Vulpes vulpes)
  • Roe Deer (Capreolus capreolus)
  • Wild Boar (Sus scrofa)
  • Wild Duck (Anas platyrhynchos)

Exclusive Bonus items for Lintukoto Reserve Owners

  • Companion: A new skin for the off-road car
  • Mikael alternative outfit
  • Remington Model 700 CDL .30-06 Sprg
  • Story Bonus: Wispy's Shotgun

Owners of the Lintukoto reserve receive several exclusive bonuses: the Companion Off-road car skin with a retro 70's look, a second outfit for Mikael, an unlockable story shotgun with engraving, and the Remington Model 700 CDL rifle, enhancing your gameplay with unique style and gear.

Car Paintjob: Companion
Companion is a new paintjob for the off-road car, designed specifically for the beautiful environment of Lintukoto. Exclusively available to all owners of the Lintukoto reserve, it can be claimed for free in the in-game shop. Companion features distinctive visual elements, including an array of stickers that highlight its owner's creativity and adventurous spirit. These stickers serve as mementos from other reserves such as Matariki Park, Transylvania, Tikamoon Plains, and more. The vehicle sports a vintage, worn white exterior with a 70's retro-inspired color palette.

Mikael Alternative Outfit
Mikael, our main protagonist from Lintukoto, now has a second outfit available. Hunters who own the Lintukoto can choose between Mikael's outfits, both reflecting his stoic, calm, and soothing demeanor. This new outfit, simple yet profound, perfectly encapsulates Mikael’s personality.

Remington Model 700 CDL .30-06 Sprg
Owners of the Lintukoto reserve are entitled to yet another exclusive bonus: the new Remington Model 700 CDL rifle. Known for its precise accuracy straight from the factory, this rifle brings its reliable action and consistent performance to your inventory. The Model 700 CDL features a sleek, satin-finished walnut stock with a black fore-end cap, and a Supercell recoil pad. Lintukoto reserve owners can claim this quality rifle for free in the in-game shop.

Story Bonus: Wispy's Shotgun
Lintukoto owners can also earn Wispy's Shotgun, a unique 16-gauge shotgun engraved with reindeer, as a reward for completing the story. This special weapon, which cannot be bought, is given based on your decisions throughout the story. Your choices determine whether Mikael receives the exclusive shotgun at the story's end.

This DLC is also part of the Map Pack 2.

content_descriptors.notes:
It is a realistic hunting game.
Animals are shot and killed with rifles, blood splatters are displayed on the ground.
Animal anatomy and the hit by the bullet are shown in the shot review. Animals are displayed as taxidermized trophies in the hunting lodge.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience the Wonders of Scandinavian Habitats. Explore the enchanting beauty of Lintukoto Reserve, from winding rivers to dense forests, and encounter a variety of unique wildlife like the Lynx and Arctic Fox
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Czech, Turkish, Japanese, Hindi, Indonesian, Slovak
*languages with full audio support
